gameDetails.name: Carson City: Father Christmas Promo
gameDetails.description:
Brettspiel Adventskalender 2018 Promo. Day 12.

When using Father Christmas, you immediately receive 5 victory points as a gift since you've been sweet this year. 
Cash limit $10

Red side: Immediately receive 2 victory points and write a letter to Father Christmas. Throw a die to check if you have been naughty or nice:

     1-2: you've been very naughty, you don't receive anything
     3-4: you've been OK: receive $5.
     5-6: you've been very nice: receive $5 and 1 cowboy in your player color (as long as the are available).


Cash limit: $10
